sentences.chinese: 鱼饵香气四溢，味道鲜美。

sentences.english: One bait was down forty fathoms.
sentences.chinese: 有个鱼饵下沉到四十英寻的深处。

sentences.english: His baits were the sardines the boy had given him.
sentences.chinese: 他的鱼饵是孩子们给的沙丁鱼。

sentences.english: Spies use sex, intelligence, and the thrill of a secret life as bait.
sentences.chinese: 间谍运用美色与智慧，周旋其中，担当鱼饵。

sentences.english: There must be some fish nibbling at the bait.
sentences.chinese: 肯定有什么鱼在咬鱼饵了。

sentences.english: Closeto nightfall a dolphin took the small hook he had rebaited.
sentences.chinese: 黄昏之际，一条海豚吞食了他重新放上鱼饵的小钩子。

sentences.english: A bait shop is a virtual candy store for a turtle.
sentences.chinese: 鱼饵店对海龟来说就象是小孩子的糖果店。

sentences.english: Now I must get your sardines and mine and your fresh baits.
sentences.chinese: 现在我该去拿你我用的沙丁鱼，还有给你的新鲜鱼饵。

sentences.english: And small mouth bass have got me hooked on Sunday afternoons.
sentences.chinese: 我爱礼拜日下午钓鱼看黑鲈吃鱼饵上钩。

sentences.english: Close to nightfall a dolphin took the small hook he had rebaited.
sentences.chinese: 黄昏之际，一条海豚吞食了他重新放上鱼饵的小钩子。

sentences.english: Firstly, we prepared some baits and then put the fishing rod in the water.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我们准备了一些鱼饵，然后把鱼竿在水里。

sentences.english: I am ready for a bait, it will be hanging on a hook.
sentences.chinese: 我准备好了鱼饵，将它吊在了鱼钩上。

sentences.english: Bait usually consisting of oily fish ground up and scattered on the water.
sentences.chinese: 鱼饵，通常由沾油的鱼类构成，在水底和散在水面上。

sentences.english: He that would catch fish, must venture his bait.
sentences.chinese: 想钓大鱼，就不要怕白费鱼饵。

sentences.english: The array consists of a list of lures specific to the type requested.
sentences.chinese: 数据包含请求类型特定的鱼饵列表。

sentences.english: The swim posture is similar to the real fish.
sentences.chinese: 鱼饵游姿测试达到印假乱真的效果。

definition: to fish with a hook and bait
variant of 魚鉤|鱼钩[yu2 gou1]
to fish (with line and hook)/to dupe
